```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, pdftools, readr)

my_valentine_lyrics <- pdf_text("my_valentine_roy_edwin_williams.pdf") %>% read_lines() %>% 
  paste(collapse = " ")
```

```{r}
pdf_data <- tibble(songtitle = 'my valentine',
                   artist= 'Roy Edwin Williams',
                   tempo = '130 BPM',
                   key = 'C Major',
                   text=my_valentine_lyrics)

write_csv(pdf_data, "D:/AU_Cog_Sci/3_semester/cognitive_neuroscience_of_music_and_language/cognitive_neuroscience_of_music_and_language/Exam/lyric_data.csv")
```
